summary: I HAVE 1999 ISUZU RODEO.  I GOT THE ABS KEEP RUNNING AND GOT A LIGHT ON PROBLEM RECENTLY AND I GOT THE  ABS DIAGNOSTIC AT DEALER AND THEY SAID I HAVE ABS SHORT AND NEED TO REPLACE ABS MODULE.  I CHECKED THE RECALL ON THIS VEHICLE AND FOUND ABS RECALL STARTING 1998 MODEL.  I ALREADY HAVE THREE ACCIDENTS FROM EXTENDED STOPPING DISTANCES BEFORE.  IS IT POSSIBLE TO GET MINE TO GET THE RECALL SERVICE?   *NLM
